alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bannock and south central Bingham Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 601 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a weakening thunderstorm near Fort Hall Putnam Lodge, or 11 miles southeast of Blackfoot, that is mostly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 30 mph. The thunderstorm is falling apart and will put out an weak outflow, likely around 20 to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Hall Putnam Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
